retrieve a user's collection with entries

add existing collections or (new) entities to a collection

delete.summary: delete one or more entries from a collection

get.summary: retrieve the parent collection order for a user's collection
retrieve the cumulated tags (and their frequencies) for all the sub collections and respective entities

retrieve a discussion with its entries

get.summary: retrieve discussions for certain entities, i.e., targets

retrieve entities information for given ID(s) or encoded URI(s)

remove an entity from public space

download a file with query params

parameters.description: circle to consider for metadata visibility

add an entity to given learning episode version
